ygData.subject: Re: Tripreds and Autobots
ygData.msgSnippet: The water in front of Gesper began to rise slowly, then gave away, splashing all over as the large all terrain millitary vehicle that is Pacifix began to drive

Subject: Re: Tripreds and Autobots
References: <9ptcnq+puck@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The water in front of Gesper began to rise slowly, then gave away,
splashing all over as the large all terrain millitary vehicle that is
Pacifix began to drive up the beach. He had two white flags tied to his
cannons. He stopped several paces away from the Tripred, then the back
part of the vehicle seperated, as the front part leapt up into the air,
transforming into the Autobots leader. Pacifix turned to Gesper, and
picked out his two freeze cannons, throwing them to the sand in front of
him, then looking back up. 

"I hear you want to speak to the Autobots."
